ED_Title: Observer status for the Cooperation Council of Turkic-speaking States in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText:
At its 62nd plenary meeting, on 13 December 2016, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee,  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the Cooperation Council of Turkic-speaking States in the Assembly until the seventy-second session of the Assembly.

(See A/71/523, para. 8, A/71/PV.62)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
